view

Class FXPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • view.FXPane
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable

    public class FXPane
extends javax.swing.JComponent
    A component for displaying some overlay effects. Used as the glassPane in MainFrame.
    Version:
    2015-11-02
    Author:
    Tor Gammelgard
    See Also:
    MainFrame, Serialized Form
